thread.title: Medicaid covers a lot more people than you might think - CNNMoney
thread.title_full: Medicaid covers a lot more people than you might think - CNNMoney

title: Medicaid covers a lot more people than you might think - CNNMoney
text:
Medicaid covers a lot more people than you might think Medicaid provides essential health care services to more than 70 million Americans. Here's a snapshot. By Tiffany Baker and Ivory Sherman Who is covered by 3 in 5 nursing home residents 2 in 5 people with disabilities Nearly half of all births Medicaid accounts for 51% of all long-term care spending By Tiffany Baker and Ivory Sherman Source: Kaiser Family Foundation Google+
